name: Roots Routes
description:
An interactive graphic novel game based on family roots and generational trauma, specifically focusing on domestic abuse and the effect on the children who witness it.

 Space bar to progress, Click on buttons to make choices.

This Itch.io download version contains an updated version of the game.

https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/roots-routes-3

Lucy Garbett - Concept and Story Writer

Jacob Woodman - Gameplay Programmer and assistant writer

Louis Clarkson - Art and Animation

Lewis Johnson - Sound Engineer
